    • Player

      public Player​(java.awt.Point ballPoint, int width, int height, java.awt.Rectangle container)
      The constructor of Player class to set the value that passes from other class
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - The position of the ball
      width - The width value to set for creating the player container
      height - The height value to set for creating the player container
      container - The area to draw the player container

  • Method Details

    • impact

      public boolean impact​(Ball b)
      To detect whether the ball is collide with player container
      Parameters:
      b - The object of the Ball class
      Returns:
      True if the ball hit the player container, False if didn't hit the player container

      This method will control the player movement to move the player

      public java.awt.Shape getPlayerFace()
      Getter method to get the object of the Rectangle created
      Returns:
      The object of the Rectangle set with the position,shape and size

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      This method will move the player container to the start point when the game reset
      Parameters:
      p - The position to set the player container
